aboutMe.title: Hello! I'm Eduard Rincon, and I'm a front-end developer
aboutMe.content: Allow me to introduce my self, as you read I'm a front-end developer located in Colombia with +3 years of experience developing web applications using Javascript and React JS. I have been part of a web application development for social media, and bank companies where I sought to improve the design, use best practices, and create pages as accessible as possible. Passionate for learning new technologies, and being collaborative with team members. Finally, I aim to contribute to world-class web applications and keep learning for the process it involves.
aboutMe.title-copy: My name is Eduard Rincon, and I'm a web developer
aboutMe.copy-content: Well... As you read, I'm a web developer formed in Universidad de La Sabana in Bogot√° - Colombia where I'm currently located. I'm a big fan of building the front-end part of a web page, and also really into solving challenges from it. I'm very curious about learning new technologies and passionate from writing code that everyone can understand.
